titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of the week of April 15 through April 19, 2024, as "National Work Zone Awareness Week".
A resolution supporting the designation of the week of April 15 through April 19, 2024, as "National Work Zone Awareness Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution supports designating the week of April 15-19, 2024, as National Work Zone Awareness Week and encourages individuals to practice work zone safety.
